org.mgm.bj.util

Class BlackJackHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mgm.bj.util.BlackJackHelper

  • public class BlackJackHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    BlackJackHelper is responsible for initializing players, setting up the deck, shuffling the cards, setting up the hands, option to hit/stand for additional card, calculating the total score and finding the blackjack winner
